message: I propose dividing the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This is a fair offer considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll give you a better deal than your initial offer, but I'm not going for a 60/40 split. I think we can do better than that.
Considering the inflation, I believe a 50/50 split would be fair for both of us. It ensures a balanced distribution while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
